column4: Hey, I think my help thread on ubuntu forums may have died (the guys hasn't responded in a number of hours). Can someone take a look please? the url is ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=10954391#post10954391
Does anyone have time to check out my thread or should I try a different channel?
this is in a virtual machine?
you cant use that usb device in a virtual machine iirc, only usb storage will work
Oh, so I need to dualboot?
what you need todo is bridge the wireless connection from windows into your VM
I have wireless in my VM, but I need to access the actual device for kismet
you need to dualboot, or check out the aircrack livecd for a ready to go patched ndiswrapped drivers for kismet
Ready to go? As in I install the things from the cd and my usb device will plug n play?
ready to go as you put the cd in your computer and boot, no install or anything
backtrack and aircrack livecd are both like that
oh I see
I tried to use backtrack too but it didn't recognize my usb thing
albeit in VM
youll never get it to work in a vm
just boot that CD and your set!
Ok, would the same work for backtrack?
Like, could I boot from the backtrack live cd and have everything ready to go?
yeah, but im not 100% sure of how well maintained backtracks drivers are for kismet, it can do alot more, where as aircrack is specifically for kismet/airocrack
Alright thanks! So I should be downloading the "Slitaz Aircrack-ng Distribution" to boot from, right?
sounds good
perfect, thanks!
